Class AbstractViewer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable

    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BDFACSDIVAFCSViewer, MicroscopyViewer

    public abstract class AbstractViewer
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, javax.swing.event.TreeSelectionListener
    Abstract viewer for processors

    Aaron Ponti

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public abstract boolean parse(java.io.File folder)
        Parses current dataset (file or folder) by doing the necessary preparation work and then calling the needed Processor.
        Parameters:
        folder - Full folder (or file) name
        Returns:
        true if the scanning of the dataset was successful, false otherwise.

      • setUserName

        public void setUserName(java.lang.String userName)
        Sets the user name to be used for scanning the user folder
        Parameters:
        userName - User name This must be called before scan() can be called!

      • setOutputPane

        public void setOutputPane(OutputPane outputPane)
        Sets the reference to the OutputPane
        Parameters:
        outputPane - A reference to the main window output pane to be used to display information.

      • scan

        public void scan()
        Scans the datamover incoming directory for datasets to be processed. At the end of scanning, the function MUST set isReady to true.

      • getDataModel

        public javax.swing.tree.TreeModel getDataModel()
        Return the Tree's data model.

      • saveToXML

        public boolean saveToXML(java.lang.String outputDirectory)
        Create and save an XML representation of the JTree to file
        Parameters:
        outputDirectory - Directory where XML property files are saved
        Returns:
        true if the XML file could be saved, false otherwise

      • saveDataStructureMap

        public boolean saveDataStructureMap(java.lang.String outputDirectory)
        Create and save a file containing a map of pointers to the experiment setting files at the root of the user folder to be used by the dropbox. The file name is structure.
        Parameters:
        outputDirectory - Directory where XML property files are saved
        Returns:
        true if the XML file could be saved, false otherwise

      • isReady

        public boolean isReady()
        Returns true if the viewer has completed creation of the data model
        Returns:
        true if the data model is complete, false otherwise

      • getPanel

        public javax.swing.JPanel getPanel()
        Return the reference to the JPanel to be added to a container component
        Returns:
        JPanel reference
